r.s: Tool to generate PECL extensions from an XML description
r.d: CodeGen_PECL (formerly known as PECL_Gen) is a pure PHP replacement for the ext_skel shell script that comes with the PHP 4 source. It reads in configuration options, function prototypes and code fragments from an XML description file and generates a complete ready-to-compile PECL extension.
r.n: Changes since 1.0.4: - new function prototype parser - added PHP version check to config.m4 - functions accepting/returning resources or classes or using constants for default values now "inherit" conditional compilation settings from these elements - disabled output of AC_CHECK_TYPE checks for resource types due to autoconf version conflicts - varargs support
